name: 3-task-manager
description: What we will learn in this project ? - How to setup and connect to the cloud database ? - How to perform all the CRUD operations ? (CRUD is fundamental to any application) - You are going to take care of both the frontend and the backend of this project - Let me stress something: this is not your typical to-do-list app that stores data    on the local storage. Instead, we are wroking with the cloud.
